metadata.title: CVE-2021-3486 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GLPi 9.5.4 does not sanitize the metadata. This way its possible to insertXSS into plugins to execute JavaScript code.

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
